details.description: We are pleased to announce our newest founding members of ODI Leeds city region.
details.content:
Founding Membership

We are pleased to announce our newest Founding Members of ODI Leeds city region.

Calderdale Council became a Founding Member in November 2014 and have brought enthusiasm together with some very interesting challenges and projects to the community. We will be working on these projects and sharing the insight over the next few months.

KPMG joined ODI Leeds as Founding Members in December 2014 and have already supported us in the development of a prototype for "Data City Leeds". The concept is to assist the development of a self-organising inventory of the data assets, people, places and infrastructure that make up Data City Leeds.

Our Founding Members are:

  • Leeds City Council
  • Bradford Council
  • Calderdale Council
  • West Yorkshire Combined Authority
  • Arup
  • Bloom Agency
  • KPMG

Individual and SME memberships

As well as Founding Members, we are developing our membership model to include individuals, SMEs and micro businesses. We have user groups who are working with us to let us know what works best for them.

Contact

If youâ€™d like to become a member of ODI Leeds please contact us at ODILeeds@gmail.com or call Paul Connell on 07833 488697.

About ODI Leeds

ODI Leeds is located on the top floor of Munro House. Duke Street, Leeds, LS9 8AG.

Find us on twitter @ODILeeds.
